name: confluence
description: A tool for team collaboration and knowledge management.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_ADD_CONTENT_LABEL
tools.description: Tool to add labels to a piece of content. Use after obtaining the content ID to tag pages or blog posts with metadata labels.

inputSchema.title: AddContentLabelRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence content (page or blog post) to label.

items.title: ContentLabelItem

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the label to add.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Label prefix indicating scope of the label.

items.description: Model representing a label to add to content.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: List of labels to add to the content.

inputSchema.description: Request model for adding labels to Confluence content.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_BLOGPOST
tools.description: Tool to create a new Confluence blog post. Use when you need to publish content in a specific space.

inputSchema.title: CreateBlogpostRequest

body.title: Body

value.title: Value
value.description: The content of the blog post in the given representation.

body.description: Content body of the blog post.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the new blog post.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space where the blog post will be created.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a Confluence blog post.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to create a property on a specified blog post. Use when you need to add custom metadata to a blog post. Creates a new property with a key-value pair on a specified Confluence blog post. This allows users to add custom metadata relevant to the blog post.

inputSchema.title: CreateBlogpostPropertyRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence blog post to add the property to.

key.title: Key
key.description: Unique key for the blog post property.

value.title: Value
value.description: JSON string representing the value of the blog post property.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a property on a Confluence blog post.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD
tools.description: Tool to create a new content property on a whiteboard. Use when you need to attach custom metadata to a Confluence whiteboard.

inputSchema.title: CreateContentPropertyForWhiteboardRequest

key.title: Key
key.description: Key/name of the property to create.

value.title: Value
value.description: JSON string representing the value of the content property.

whiteboard_id.title: Whiteboard Id
whiteboard_id.description: ID of the whiteboard to add the property to.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a content property on a Confluence whiteboard.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PAGE
tools.description: Tool to create a new Confluence page in a specified space. Use when you need to create new documentation or content.

inputSchema.title: CreatePageRequest

value.title: Value
examples: This is a new page with rich content
value.description: The content body in Confluence storage format.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: The representation format of the content. Must be 'storage'.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space where the page will be created.

parentId.title: Parent Id
parentId.description: ID of the parent page (if creating as a child page).

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for creating a new Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PAGE_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to create a property on a Confluence page. Use when you need to add custom metadata or settings to a page.

inputSchema.title: CreatePagePropertyRequest

key.title: Key
key.description: Key/name of the property to create.

value.title: Value
value.description: Value of the property as a JSON string. Can represent any JSON type (string, number, object, array).

page_id.title: Page Id
page_id.description: ID of the page to create a property for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a property on a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_PRIVATE_SPACE
tools.description: Tool to create a private Confluence space. Use when you need an isolated workspace viewable only by its creator.

inputSchema.title: CreatePrivateSpaceRequest

key.title: Key
key.description: A unique key for the private space; must be unique and <=255 characters.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the private space, visible only to its creator.

plain.title: Plain

value.title: Value
examples: This space is for my personal notes.
value.description: The plain-text description of the private space.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: Format of the description. Must be 'plain'.

plain.description: A nested object holding the plain-text description and its format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a private Confluence space.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_SPACE
tools.description: Tool to create a new Confluence space. Use when setting up a new knowledge area for organization.

inputSchema.title: CreateSpaceRequest

key.title: Key
key.description: A unique key for the space. Must be alphanumeric characters only (letters and numbers), up to 255 characters. Underscores and hyphens are not allowed.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of the space, either 'global' or 'personal'.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Optional metadata for the space as a JSON string.

description.title: SpaceDescription

value.title: Value
examples: This space is used for project documentation.
value.description: The plain text description of the space.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: Representation format of the description. Must be 'plain'.

description.description: Description object for a Confluence space.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a Confluence space.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_SPACE_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to create a new property on a Confluence space. Use after confirming the space ID when adding custom metadata.

inputSchema.title: CreateSpacePropertyRequest

key.title: Key
key.description: Unique key for the space property.

value.title: Value
value.description: JSON string representing the value of the space property.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space to add the property to.

version.title: Version

number.title: Number
number.description: Version number for the space property (must be ≥ 1).

message.title: Message
message.description: Optional change message for this version.

version.description: Optional version metadata for the new property.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a property in a Confluence space.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_CREATE_WHITEBOARD
tools.description: Tool to create a new Confluence whiteboard. Use when you need to start a collaborative whiteboard session.

inputSchema.title: CreateWhiteboardRequest

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space where the whiteboard will be created.

parentId.title: Parent Id
parentId.description: ID of the parent content under which the whiteboard will be created.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new Confluence whiteboard.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to delete a blog post property. Use when you need to remove custom metadata from a specified blog post.

inputSchema.title: DeleteBlogpostPropertyRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the Confluence blog post containing the property.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The numeric Long ID of the blog post property to delete. Must be a numeric property ID, not a property key.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a property from a Confluence blog post.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_PAGE_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to delete a content property from a page by property ID. Use when you need to remove custom metadata from a page for cleanup or auditing. This action deletes a specified content property from a Confluence page using its page ID and property ID. It is useful for removing outdated or unnecessary metadata.

inputSchema.title: DeleteContentPropertyForPageByIdRequest

pageId.title: Page Id
pageId.description: ID of the Confluence page from which to delete the property.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The numeric Long ID of the content property to delete from the page. Must be a numeric property ID, not a property key.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a content property from a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to delete a content property from a whiteboard by property ID. Use when you need to remove custom metadata from a whiteboard.

inputSchema.title: DeleteContentPropertyForWhiteboardByIdRequest

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The numeric Long ID of the property to delete from the whiteboard. Must be a numeric property ID, not a property key.

whiteboardId.title: Whiteboard Id
whiteboardId.description: ID of the whiteboard from which to delete the property.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a content property from a Confluence whiteboard.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_PAGE
tools.description: Tool to delete a Confluence page. Use with caution as this will permanently remove the page from the space.

inputSchema.title: DeletePageRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the page to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for deleting a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_SPACE
tools.description: Tool to delete a Confluence space by its key. Use when you need to permanently remove a space.

inputSchema.title: DeleteSpaceRequest

space_key.title: Space Key
space_key.description: Key of the space to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a Confluence space by its key.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_DELETE_SPACE_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to delete a space property. Use when you need to remove a property from a Confluence space after review.

inputSchema.title: DeleteSpacePropertyRequest

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The numeric Long ID of the space property to delete. Must be a numeric property ID, not a property key.

spaceIdOrKey.title: Space Id Or Key
spaceIdOrKey.description: The numeric Long ID of the space containing the property. Must be a numeric space ID, not a space key or UUID.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a property from a Confluence space.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_ATTACHMENT_LABELS
tools.description: Tool to list labels on an attachment. Use after confirming the attachment ID to fetch its labels.

inputSchema.title: GetAttachmentLabelsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence attachment to retrieve labels for.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of labels to return per page.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first label to return (pagination offset).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving labels of a Confluence attachment.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_ATTACHMENTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve attachments of a Confluence page. Use after confirming page ID to list its attachments (supports pagination).

inputSchema.title: GetAttachmentsRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of attachments to return per page. Confluence caps at 200.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first item to return (pagination offset).

pageId.title: Page Id
pageId.description: ID of the Confluence page whose attachments will be retrieved.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving attachments of a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_AUDIT_LOGS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve Confluence audit records. Use when you need to fetch and filter audit logs for compliance or troubleshooting.

inputSchema.title: GetAuditLogsRequest

to.description: End of the audit record timestamp range (ISO 8601 format).

from_.title: From
from_.description: Start of the audit record timestamp range (ISO 8601 format).

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of audit records to return per page.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first audit record to return (pagination offset).

searchString.title: Search String
searchString.description: Free-text search to filter audit records by summary or category.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving Confluence audit records.

id.description: Unique identifier of the Confluence blog post to retrieve.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence blog post to retrieve labels for.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of labels to return per page.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first label to return (pagination offset).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving labels of a Confluence blog post.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_LIKE_COUNT
tools.description: Tool to get like count for a Confluence blog post. Use after confirming the blog post ID to retrieve total likes.

inputSchema.title: GetBlogpostLikeCountRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence blog post to retrieve like count for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving the like count of a Confluence blog post.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving permitted operations on a Confluence blog post.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

tools.description: Tool to list all blog posts under a specific label. Use when you have a label ID and need to retrieve associated blog posts.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

blogpostId.description: Unique identifier of the Confluence blog post.

versionNumber.description: Version number of the blog post to retrieve.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_BLOGPOST_VERSIONS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve all versions of a specific blog post. Use when you have a blogpostId and need to list version numbers.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of version items to return per page.

blogpostId.title: Blogpost Id
blogpostId.description: The unique identifier of the Confluence blog post.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page. Confluence caps at 100.

page_id.title: Page Id
page_id.description: Identifier of the Confluence page to retrieve properties for.

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the content to retrieve restrictions for.

expand.title: Expand
expand.description: Comma-separated properties to expand in the response, e.g., ['restrictables.operation', 'user']

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving restrictions on a Confluence content item.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_CURRENT_USER
tools.description: Tool to get information about the currently authenticated user. Use when you need to check user details or permissions.

inputSchema.title: GetCurrentUserRequest
inputSchema.description:
Request model for getting current user information.
No parameters needed as this gets the authenticated user's info.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_INLINE_COMMENTS_FOR_BLOG_POST
tools.description: Tool to retrieve inline comments for a Confluence blog post. Use when you need inline comment details by blog post ID.

inputSchema.title: GetInlineCommentsForBlogPostRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the blog post to retrieve inline comments for.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of inline comments to return per page (default 25).

start.title: Start
start.description: Index of the first inline comment to return (0-based).

expand.title: Expand
expand.description: Comma-separated list of properties to expand in the response (e.g., 'body,author').

location.title: Location
location.description: Return comments for a specific location within the blog post content.

parentVersion.title: Parent Version
parentVersion.description: Return comments relevant to a specific version of the blog post.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving inline comments for a Confluence blog post.

limit.title: Limit

tools.description: Tool to retrieve all ancestors for a given Confluence page by its ID. Use when you need the full page hierarchy.

inputSchema.title: GetPageAncestorsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the Confluence page to retrieve ancestors for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving ancestor pages of a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a Confluence page by its ID. Use when you have a page ID and need its detailed metadata and content.

inputSchema.title: GetPageByIdRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Numeric Long ID of the Confluence page to retrieve. Must be a numeric long value, not a UUID or string identifier.

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: Whether to return the draft version (default: false).

version.title: Version
version.description: Specific page version to retrieve (default: latest).

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving a Confluence page by its ID.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_LIKE_COUNT
tools.description: Tool to get like count for a Confluence page. Use after confirming the page ID to retrieve total likes.

inputSchema.title: GetPageLikeCountRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the Confluence page to retrieve like count for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving the like count of a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of pages. Use when you need a paginated list of Confluence pages.

inputSchema.title: GetPagesRequest

sort.title: PageSortOrder
sort.description: Sort order for Confluence pages using AbstractPageSortOrder enum values.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of pages to return per page. Confluence caps at 250.

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Opaque pagination cursor. Use the 'next' link from a previous response to continue.

status.title: Status
status.description: Filter by page status. Allowed values: current, archived, deleted, trashed.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: Filter by space ID(s). Provide a single ID or a list of IDs.

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: Filter by page subtype. Valid values: live, page.

body_format.title: Body Format
body_format.description: Body representation to include in results. Allowed values: 'storage' (storage format) or 'atlas_doc_format' (Atlas document format). The value 'view' is not supported.

inputSchema.description:
Request model for retrieving Confluence pages with pagination and optional filters.

Notes:
- Filters are applied together (AND logic). For example, spaceId AND status AND title.
- This action aligns with Confluence REST API v2 GET /pages and only includes supported parameters.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_PAGE_VERSIONS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve all versions of a specific Confluence page. Use after confirming the page ID to audit its edit history.

inputSchema.title: GetPageVersionsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the Confluence page.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of versions to return per page (pagination limit).

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first version to return (pagination offset).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving all versions of a Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a Confluence space by its ID. Use when you need detailed metadata of a specific space.

inputSchema.title: GetSpaceByIdRequest

id.description: The ID of the space to be returned.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a Confluence space by its ID.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_CONTENTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve content in a Confluence space. Use when you need to list pages, blogposts, or attachments of a specific space key.

inputSchema.title: GetSpaceContentsRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page. Confluence caps at 200.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first item to return (pagination offset).

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the content to return ('current', 'trashed', 'draft', 'historical').

spaceKey.title: Space Key
spaceKey.description: Key of the space to retrieve content from.

postingDay.title: Posting Day
postingDay.description: For blogposts, filter by publish date (ISO date, yyyy-MM-dd).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving content within a Confluence space by space key.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACE_PROPERTIES
tools.description: Tool to get properties of a Confluence space. Use when you need to retrieve custom metadata or settings stored as space properties.

inputSchema.title: GetSpacePropertiesRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the space to get properties for.

key.title: Key
key.description: Filter by property key(s). If not provided, returns all properties.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of properties to return per page. Confluence caps at 200.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first item to return (pagination offset).

inputSchema.description: Request model for getting properties of a Confluence space.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_SPACES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of Confluence spaces. Use when you need a paginated list of spaces with optional filtering.

inputSchema.title: GetSpacesRequest

label.title: Label
label.description: Filter by labels; spaces must have at least one of these labels.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of spaces to return per page. Confluence caps at 200.

start.title: Start
start.description: Zero-based index of the first item to return (pagination offset).

spaceKey.title: Space Key
spaceKey.description: Filter by space key(s); accepts one or more space keys.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving Confluence spaces with pagination and optional filters.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_GET_USER_ANONYMOUS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about the anonymous user. Use when you need to obtain guest user details before unauthenticated interactions.

inputSchema.title: GetUserAnonymousRequest
inputSchema.description:
Request model for retrieving information about the anonymous user.
No parameters required for this endpoint.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_SEARCH_CONTENT
tools.description: Searches for content by filtering pages from the Confluence v2 API with intelligent ranking. Since the native search endpoint is deprecated, this action: 1. Fetches pages from the v2 pages endpoint with pagination (up to 300 pages) 2. Applies intelligent client-side filtering with relevance scoring 3. Returns results ranked by match quality (exact phrase > all words > partial matches) The search algorithm prioritizes exact phrase matches, then checks for all query words present in the title, and finally considers partial word matches. Results are automatically sorted by relevance score for optimal user experience.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

query.title: Query
query.description: Search query to find matching pages. The search will look for this text in page titles with intelligent matching including: (1) Exact phrase matches (highest priority), (2) All words present anywhere in title (medium priority), (3) Partial word matches (lowest priority). Search is case-insensitive and supports multiple words.

expand.title: Expand
expand.description: Comma-separated list of properties to expand in the response

spaceKey.title: Space Key
spaceKey.description: Limit search to a specific space by space key (will be added to CQL query)

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_SEARCH_USERS
tools.description: Searches for users using user-specific queries from the Confluence Query Language (CQL).

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of users per result to return

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Used for pagination. The cursor for the next page of results.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_BLOGPOST
tools.description: Tool to update a Confluence blog post's title or content. Use when you need to modify an existing blog post. Ensure you have the latest version number before calling.

inputSchema.title: UpdateBlogpostRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the blog post to update.

body.title: Body

value.title: Value
value.description: The content of the blog post in storage format.

body.description: New content for the blog post body. Provide the body in storage format.

title.title: Title
title.description: New title for the blog post.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the blog post. Defaults to 'current' if not provided.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space containing the blog post.

version.title: Version

number.title: Number
number.description: New version number for the blog post (must be ≥ 1).

message.title: Message
message.description: Optional message describing the version update.

minorEdit.title: Minor Edit
minorEdit.description: Whether this update is a minor edit.

version.description: Version object containing the new version number and optional metadata.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a Confluence blog post by its ID.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_BLOGPOST_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to update a property of a specified blog post. Use when you need to modify custom metadata on a blog post.

inputSchema.title: UpdateBlogpostPropertyRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the Confluence blog post to update.

value.title: Value
value.description: New JSON string value for the specified property.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The numeric Long ID of the blog post property to update. Must be a numeric property ID, not a property key.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a property of a Confluence blog post.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_PAGE_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to update a content property on a Confluence page. Use when you need to modify an existing metadata property by its ID.

inputSchema.title: UpdateContentPropertyForPageByIdRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: New JSON string value for the specified property.

pageId.title: Page Id
pageId.description: ID of the Confluence page to update the property on.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: ID of the content property to update on the page.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a content property on a Confluence page by property ID.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_CONTENT_PROPERTY_FOR_WHITEBOARD_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to update a content property on a whiteboard. Use when you need to modify metadata on a Confluence whiteboard.

inputSchema.title: UpdateContentPropertyForWhiteboardByIdRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: New JSON string value for the specified content property.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: ID of the content property to update on the whiteboard.

whiteboardId.title: Whiteboard Id
whiteboardId.description: ID of the Confluence whiteboard containing the property to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a content property on a Confluence whiteboard.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_PAGE
tools.description: Tool to update an existing Confluence page. Use when you need to modify existing documentation or content.

inputSchema.title: UpdatePageRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the page to update.

body.title: Body

wiki.title: PageBody

value.title: Value
value.description: The content body in the specified representation.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: The representation format of the content. Supported values: 'storage', 'atlas_doc_format', 'wiki'.

wiki.description: Page body content in a supported representation.

storage.title: PageBody

value.title: Value
value.description: The content body in the specified representation.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: The representation format of the content. Supported values: 'storage', 'atlas_doc_format', 'wiki'.

storage.description: Page body content in a supported representation.

atlas_doc_format.title: PageBody

value.title: Value
value.description: The content body in the specified representation.

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: The representation format of the content. Supported values: 'storage', 'atlas_doc_format', 'wiki'.

atlas_doc_format.description: Page body content in a supported representation.

body.description: Updated content body of the page in nested form. Provide exactly one of: 'storage', 'atlas_doc_format', or 'wiki'. Each must include 'value' and 'representation' (which must match the property name used).

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: ID of the space containing the page. Optional if the page's space doesn't need to be changed.

message.title: Message
message.description: Optional version message describing the changes.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for updating an existing Confluence page.

tools.name: CONFLUENCE_UPDATE_SPACE_PROPERTY
tools.description: Tool to update a space property. Use when you need to modify custom metadata stored on a Confluence space (requires fetching the current property version first).

inputSchema.title: UpdateSpacePropertyRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: New JSON string value for the specified space property.

spaceId.title: Space Id
spaceId.description: The ID of the space the property belongs to.

propertyId.title: Property Id
propertyId.description: The ID of the space property to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a property of a Confluence space.
